information: The company BAUTZENER BRAUEREI GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1846, which operates in the Drinks, soft industry. It also operates in the Juices, fruit and vegetable, Mineral water, Liquors and spirits, and Wines industries. It is based in Bautzen, Germany.
